price: 86. Ma aad aheyn (Nabiyow) mid rajeyn in lagugu soo dejiyo Kitaabka (Qur’aanka), hase yeeshee waa Naxariis xagga Rabbigaa ah. Ee ha noqonin mid garab siiya gaalada25.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: 25. Ha ugu kaalmeyn diintooda adigoo waafaqaya caqiidadooda ama ansixinaya.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta tarjū an yul'qā ilayka al-kitābu illā raḥmatan min rabbika falā takūnanna ẓahīran lil'kāfirīna
